net.sf.mpxj.mpp

Class GanttBarStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mpxj.mpp.GanttBarCommonStyle
      • net.sf.mpxj.mpp.GanttBarStyle

  • public final class GanttBarStyle
extends GanttBarCommonStyle
    This class represents the default style for a Gantt chart bar.
